biotools.summary: a biomedical relation extraction dataset (BioRED) with multiple entity types (e.g. gene/protein, disease, chemical) and relation pairs (e.g. gene-disease; chemical-chemical) at the document level, on a set of 600 PubMed abstracts.

bioschemas.name: BioRED
bioschemas.summary: a biomedical relation extraction dataset (BioRED) with multiple entity types (e.g. gene/protein, disease, chemical) and relation pairs (e.g. gene-disease; chemical-chemical) at the document level, on a set of 600 PubMed abstracts.
